title: Cameo Pepsin or Whitehead Hoag Pin needed
author: biggies

posts.post_title: Cameo Pepsin or Whitehead Hoag Pin needed
posts.post_content:
Looking for either of these pins with my great-great grandfather Jimmy Bannon on them. I know they are pricey, but I'm hoping to find one.

Leon helped with a Mayos of Jimmy about 5 years ago! 

Any chance someone has 1 they will sell, i'd love to hear it.

Thanks, Bob

Bob--Did you get the message I sent?

Jay
